name: KiviCare – Clinic & Patient Management System (EHR)
author: iqonic

sections.description:
Save Big with a 30% OFF Discount on KiviCare Theme & KiviCare Pro!

Launch your Online Clinic in 60 Seconds! 🚀
KiviCare is the most simple self-hosted clinic and patient management solution based on WordPress platform. Setup your online clinic instantly.

KiviCare is a result of 3years of development. Its one and only Medical EHR solution on WordPress built with VUE JS for pure MAGICAL EXPERIENCE.

DEMO | PRO | WP Theme | Zoom Telemed | Google Meet Telemed | Mobile App | Docs

Clinic Management made (incredibly) Easy & Affordable
Form Appointment Booking to Billing, everything you will ever need to manage your clinic and patient records effortlessly.

A WordPress plugin that doesn’t feel like one.

Features

  1. Built with Vue JS – No page reloads.
  2. Appointment Booking
  3. Patient Records.
  4. Encounter (Patient Visits) Management
  5. Patient Portal
  6. Doctors Scheduling
  7. Doctor Services
  8. Multiple Roles: Super Admin, Clinic Admin, Doctor, Receptionist, Patient.
  9. Paypal Integration for Online Payments
  10. Email Reminders & Notification
  11. Custom Email Templates
  12. Custom Fields for prominent forms.
  13. Powerful Settings Panel
  14. Multilanguage support via translation plugins
  15. Insightful Dashboard
  16. Website Widgets & Blocks for
    a. Booking Form / Button [kivicareBookAppointmentButton]
    b. Doctor List
    c. Login/Register Page [kivicareRegisterLogin]

Pro Features

  1. Multi Clinic Setup
  2. WooCommerce Payment Integration
  3. Google Calendar Integraion
  4. SMS alerts via Twilio integration
  5. WhatsApp alerts via Twilio
  6. Advanced Styling options
  7. RTL Support
  8. Reports
  9. Zoom Telemed Integration (Addon)
  10. Google Meet Telemed Integration (Addon)

**KiviCare Premium Products **

From EHR to Telemed to Mobile apps, KiviCare has a range of interoperable products to make a perfect solution for you.

  • KiviCare Pro
  • KiviCare WordPress Theme
  • Zoom Telemed Addon
  • Google Meet Telemed Addon
  • Flutter Mobile App

Services
Need help from our Experts for Setup or Customization?
Contact Us

Support
– Documentation
– Video Tutorials

FEEDBACK
Submit a feature request HERE. and sssshhh!! We listen very carefully!

YOU ARE IN GOOD COMPANY
KiviCare is crafted by team IQONIC – expert, young, & dynamic creators of community-focused digital products and trusted by over 100K individuals and businesses.

HOLD ON THERE,…NOT SO FAST. WE HAVE MORE FREE STUFF.
We simply love our community and we can’t stop ourselves from creating great products for you. Don’t miss to check these. I promise you’ll be amazed

Graphina – It is the most powerful Elementor charts and graphs plugin that ever existed on WordPress.
MARVY – Coolest background animations for Elementor page builder.
Kivicare – One and only Medical EHR solution on WordPress. Built with by VUE JS and Experience is like pure MAGIC. Do try it out.
WP Roadmap – Create a product roadmap and feedback board with

Say Hi on SOCIAL MEDIA

  • Instagram
  • Youtube
  • Dribbble
  • Facebook
  • Twitter
sections.faq:
Does it work with any theme?

Yes, you can use it with any theme.

Can I customize Vue JS front-end code?

No. our front-end is built in Vue JS. Sourcecode of which is not included in the FREE plugin. You can get the extended license of PRO version for Vue JS source code

How to get support for the free version?

Support for the Free version is only via Documentation and Video Guides

Where can I report bugs, or request new features?

Yes, we’d love to hear from you at hello@iqonic.design.

sections.reviews:
Amazing WordPress Plugin for Kivicare

By aman1211 on September 23, 2023

I want to Thank everyone for such a great wonderful development..

THIS PLUGIN IS A WASTE OF MONEY

By viplavm on August 5, 2023

Problems in the plugin:
The plugin has many problems like
unnecessary fields of information marked "important" in the patient details form, and some important fields like "referred by" are missing.
Billing can only be done with registered patients and after adding an encounter, it is not possible to create bills with any of the two. It is impractical in the real world.
And you don't get a bed management section in this plugin, neither they have a medicine billing option.
I contacted the support team and had group chats also with them, listing all these improvements I suggested they quoted me for $1799.
I was like, WTF dude? I can get more than 100 plugins better than yours in this amount.
You also can see very aggressive branding, which means even after purchasing and customizing you see KiviCare written everywhere.

See there are better plugins like Smart Hospital, WP Hospital, and WP ERP (in some cases) so just don't waste money on this joke.

This company is not being handled by the founder, only some bootlickers are in power who want to bring money without actually improving the product.

Apointments booking lacks of important features.

By rizoma on July 12, 2023

Plugin lacks of important features: Apointment synchronization with google calendar: if i have booked hours in my google calendar kivikare does not care and let users book apointments in these hours.
Therefore there is no possibility to approve apointments manually. The lack of these 2 features make this plugin useless for real life clinic enviroment.
We'll probably opt for calendy witch have all these features in the free version. (and we do have pro version fo kivicare. :( )

Nice

By Dr md shahriar kabir (shahriar83) on June 24, 2022

Great work!

good plugin

By vividwebtech.in (onlineshop32344) on May 25, 2022

good plugin , but best plugins needs more improvement(add more customized features ) vividwebtech.in

Not working

By hoquemamon on March 1, 2022

Sorry to say that even the plugin is a complete solution for medical clinic but plugin is not working, even though i have added 10+ doctors with sessions but while appointment booking its say "select doctor or clinic is not available". tried every possible way even though complete uninstalling og WordPress. Sometimes do not shows doctors, other issues are there also, kindly fix it.my website url is https:theroyalmedical.in

Doctor Friendly Support

By dorukeke174 on December 27, 2021

I used the plugins in my WordPress they are very good.

Best Clinic Management Plugins

By amelo8520 on December 17, 2021

Just completed my project with them and very happy with the level of their dedication. Thanks guys.

Wast of money and time. No way to customize dashboard

By joejuanpablo on December 5, 2021

Wast of money and time. No way to customize the dashboard, even for paid version. The author does not response to our concerns. The dashboard is delivered with minified js. In their presentation they said that the dashboard is made with VueJS, but the source is not delivered or does not exist. Wast of money and time, Wast of money and time, Wast of money and time. N.B: if I'm wrong, please explain to me and to the other customers how we can customize the dashboard, and where can we download the VueJS source code.

Great Plugin And The Greatest!

By drgyan on March 4, 2022

The only plugin for running an online digital clinic, fulfilling all of my needs. Some themes and cache plugins may not be compatible but after trying a few themes and by removing the cache plugin I solved the issue which was found in the user interface of the appointment widget provided by this plugin. Update; I purchased the pro addon and I am fully satisfied. I am going to purchase the Zoom telemed addon as soon as possible.

short_description: KiviCare is an impressive clinic and patient management plugin (EHR).
